verses.verse: When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G2036><s%> these words, <S%G5023><s%> he went forth <S%G1831><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brook <S%G5493><s%> Cedron, <S%G2748><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a garden, <S%G2779><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> entered, <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> which betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> place: <S%G5117><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> ofttimes <S%G4178><s%> resorted <S%G4863><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Judas <S%G2455><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> a band <S%G4686><s%> of men and <S%G2532><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> lanterns <S%G5322><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> torches <S%G2985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> weapons. <S%G3696><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that should come <S%G2064><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him, <S%G848><s%> went forth, <S%G1831><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> ye?

They answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth. <S%G3480><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he. And <S%G1161><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> which betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

As soon then as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3767><s%> he had said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he, they went <S%G565><s%> backward, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3694><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> to the ground. <S%G5476><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> he them <S%G846><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> ye? And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth. <S%G3480><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> I have told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he: if <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ye seek <S%G2212><s%> me, <S%G1691><s%> let <S%G863><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> go their way: <S%G5217><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spake, <S%G2036><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> have <S%G3756><s%> I lost <S%G622><s%> none. <S%G3762><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a sword <S%G3162><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> smote <S%G3817><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> high priest's <S%G749><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cut off <S%G609><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> ear. <S%G5621><s%> <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> servant's <S%G1401><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> Malchus. <S%G3124><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Put up <S%G906><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sheath: <S%G2336><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> shall I not <S%G3364><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> it? <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> band <S%G4686><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> captain <S%G5506><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> took <S%G4815><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> led him away <S%G520><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Annas <S%G452><s%> first; <S%G4412><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> father in law <S%G3995><s%> to Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%> that same <S%G1565><s%> year. <S%G1763><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> he, <S%G3588><s%> which gave counsel <S%G4823><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was expedient <S%G4851><s%> that one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> should die <S%G622><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> so did another <S%G243><s%> disciple: <S%G3101><s%> <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> high priest, <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went in with <S%G4897><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> palace <S%G833><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> high priest. <S%G749><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> door <S%G2374><s%> without. <S%G1854><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> that other <S%G243><s%> disciple, <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> high priest, <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spake <S%G2036><s%> unto her that kept the door, <S%G2377><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brought in <S%G1521><s%> Peter. <S%G4074><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> damsel <S%G3814><s%> that kept the door <S%G2377><s%> unto Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> saith, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> there, who had made <S%G4160><s%> a fire of coals; <S%G439><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> cold: <S%G5592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they warmed <S%G2328><s%> themselves: and <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2476><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> warmed <S%G2328><s%> himself.

The <S%G3588><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> doctrine. <S%G1322><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> world; <S%G2889><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> whither <S%G3699><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> resort; <S%G4905><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret <S%G2927><s%> have I said <S%G2980><s%> nothing. <S%G3752><s%>

Why <S%G5101><s%> askest <S%G1905><s%> thou me? <S%G1905><s%> ask <S%G1905><s%> them which heard <S%G191><s%> me, what <S%G5101><s%> I have said <S%G2980><s%> unto them: <S%G846><s%> behold, <S%G2396><s%> they <S%G3778><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> said. <S%G2036><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> had thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken, <S%G2036><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> which stood by <S%G3936><s%> struck Jesus with the palm of his hand, <S%G1325><s%> <S%G2424><s%> <S%G4475><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> Answerest <S%G611><s%> thou the <S%G3588><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> so? <S%G3779><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> evil, <S%G2560><s%> bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> evil: <S%G2556><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> well, <S%G2573><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> smitest <S%G1194><s%> thou me? <S%G3165><s%>
Now Annas <S%G452><s%> had sent <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> high priest. <S%G749><s%>

And Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> warmed <S%G2328><s%> himself. They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> high priest, <S%G749><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> his kinsman <S%G4773><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> ear <S%G5621><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> cut off, <S%G609><s%> saith, <S%G3004><s%> Did not <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> garden <S%G2779><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>
Peter <S%G4074><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> again: <S%G3825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> crew. <S%G5455><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> led <S%G71><s%> they Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hall of judgment: <S%G4232><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> early; <S%G4405><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> themselves went <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> judgment hall, <S%G4232><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> they should be defiled; <S%G3392><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might eat <S%G5315><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover. <S%G3957><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> accusation <S%G2724><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> ye against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man? <S%G444><s%>

They answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> a malefactor, <S%G2555><s%> we would not <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G302><s%> delivered him up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G846><s%> unto thee. <S%G4671><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Take <S%G2983><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> him <S%G846><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> It is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G3756><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> to put any man to death: <S%G615><s%> <S%G3762><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spake, <S%G2036><s%> signifying <S%G4591><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he should <S%G3195><s%> die. <S%G599><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> judgment hall <S%G4232><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Sayest <S%G3004><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> this thing <S%G5124><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thyself, <S%G1438><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> did others <S%G243><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> it thee <S%G4671><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me? <S%G1700><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> <S%G3385><s%> Am <S%G1510><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> a Jew? <S%G2453><s%> Thine own <S%G4674><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> have delivered <S%G3860><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> unto me: <S%G1698><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> hast thou done? <S%G4160><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world: <S%G2889><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> then would my <S%G1699><s%> servants <S%G5257><s%> fight, <S%G75><s%> <S%G302><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I should not <S%G3361><s%> be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Jews: <S%G2453><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> from hence. <S%G1782><s%>
